profile:
Professional Site Assessment:
Herc Du Soleil solar designs maximize your dollar return. Our goal is to educate you so you can make an informed decision that suits your specific situation.
 
Maximizing Your Return on Investment:
Herc Du Soleil pays close attention to the details to ensure appealing aesthetics and a professional design. Our designs are guaranteed to generate the maximum return on your investment.
 
Up to Date Technologies:
Herc Du Soleil keeps up to date on the newest solar technologies.
 
We Do the Work:
Leave all of the paperwork to us. Rest assured we will take care of all required applications (OPA and LDC), engineering, permits (ESA), and all inspections.
 
 
Call or email Gopal for a free quote at 905-717-0321 or gopal@hercdusoleil.com!
